data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Ourense.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Ourense, Galicia, Spain
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Ourense, Galicia, Spain.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Ourense, Galicia, Spain. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, make bold the prophets in Ourense, Galicia, Spain so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of O Carballiño
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of O Carballiño, Galicia, Spain.
Father, for those in trouble in the county of Ourense prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Ourense, Galicia, Spain to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Ourense, Galicia, Spain and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

location.name: Ourense
location.cities_list: Ourense, Verín, O Carballiño, O Barco de Valdeorras, Xinzo de Limia
location.cities_list_w_pop: Ourense (107,742), Verín (14,391), O Carballiño (13,939), O Barco de Valdeorras (13,463), Xinzo de Limia (10,161)
